SA07n934:2: tato hṛte bharttari gauraveṇa prītau hṛtāyāmaratau kṛtāyām |
SA07n934:3: tatraiva harmyopari vartamānā na sundarī saiva tadā babhāse ||1 ||
SA07n934:6: vilambahārā calayoktrakā sā tasmād vimānād vinatā cakāśe |
SA07n934:7: tapaḥ kṣayādapsarasāṃ vareva cyutaṃ vimānāt priyamīkṣamāṇā ||3 ||
SA07n934:12: athātra kācit pramadā sabāṣpāṃ tāṃ duḥkhitāṃ draṣṭumanīpsamānā |
SA07n934:15: prītyāṃ prasaktaiva ca saṃjaharṣa priyopayānaṃ pariśaṅkamānā ||7 ||
SA07n934:18: tāmaṅganāṃ prekṣya ca vipralabdhā niśvasya bhūyaḥ śayanaṃ prapede |
SA07n934:19: vivarṇavaktrā na rarāja cāśu vivarṇacandreva himāgame dyauḥ ||9 ||
SA07n934:20: sā duḥkhitā bhartturadarśanena kāmena kopena ca dahyamānā |
SA07n934:21: kṛtvā kare vaktramupopaviṣṭā cintānadīṃ śokajalāṃ tatāra ||10 ||
SA07n934:22: tasyāḥ mukhaṃ padmasapatnabhūtaṃ pāṇau sthitaṃ pallavarāgatāmre |
SA07n934:24: sā strīsvabhāvena vicintya tattad dṛṣṭānurāge'bhimukhe'pi patyau |
SA07n934:26: eṣyāmyanāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ tvayīti kṛtvā mayi taṃ pratijñām |
SA07n934:27: kasmānnu hetordayitapratijñaḥ so'dya priyo me vitathapratijñaḥ ||13 ||
SA07n934:30: ratipriyasya priyavartino me priyasya nūnaṃ hṛdaya viraktam |
SA07n934:31: tathāpi rāgo yadi tasya hi syān maccittarakṣī na sa nāgataḥ syāt ||15 ||
SA07n934:32: rūpeṇa bhāvena ca madviśiṣṭā priyeṇa dṛṣṭā niyataṃ tato'nyā |
SA07n934:33: tathā hi kṛtvā mayi moghasāntvaṃ lagnāṃ satiṃ māmāgamad vihāya ||16 ||
SA07n934:34: bhaktiṃ sa buddhaṃ prati yāvavocattasya prayātuṃ mayi so'padeśaḥ |
SA07n934:35: munau prasādo yadi tasya hi syānmṛtyorivogrādanṛtād bibhīyāt ||17 ||
SA07n934:37: bibharti so'nyasya janasya taṃ cennamo'stu tasmai calasauhṛdāya ||18 ||
SA07n934:38: necchanti yāḥ śokamavāptumevaṃ śraddhātumarhanti na tā narāṇām |
SA07n934:39: kva cānuvṛttirmayi sāsya pūrvaṃ tyāgaḥ kva cāyaṃ janavat kṣaṇena ||19 ||
SA07n934:40: ityevamādi priyaviprayuktā priye'nyadāśaṅkya ca sā jagāda |
SA07n934:41: saṃbhrāntamāruhya ca tadvimānaṃ tāṃ strī sabāṣpā giramityuvāca ||20 ||
SA07n934:44: mā svāminaṃ svāmini doṣato gāḥ priyaṃ priyārhaṃ priyakāriṇaṃ tam |
SA07n934:45: na sa tvadanyāṃ pramadāmavaiti svacakravākyā iva cakravākaḥ ||22 ||
SA07n934:48: śrutvā tato bhartari tāṃ pravṛttiṃ savepathuḥ sā sahasotpapāt |
SA07n934:49: pragṛhya bāhū virurāva coccairhṛdīva digdhābhihata kareṇuḥ ||24 ||
SA07n934:52: sā padmarāgaṃ vasanaṃ vasānā padmānanā padmadalāyatākṣī |
SA07n934:53: padmā vipadmā patiteva lakṣmīḥ śuśoṣa padmasragivātapena ||26 ||
SA07n934:54: saṃcintya sacintya guṇāṃśca bharturdīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa tatāma caiva |
SA07n934:55: vibhūṣaṇaśrīnihite prakoṣṭhe tāmre karāgre ca vinirdudhāva ||27 ||
SA07n934:56: na bhūṣaṇārtho mama saṃpratīti sā dikṣu cikṣepa vibhūṣaṇāni |
SA07n934:57: nirbhūṣaṇā sā patitā cakāśe viśīrṇapuṣpastabakā lateva ||28 ||
SA07n934:59: yatnācca vinyastatamālapatrau ruṣṭeva dhṛṣṭaṃ pramamājaṃ gaṇḍau ||29 ||
SA07n934:63: rukmāṅgapāde śayane mahārhe na śarma lebhe pariceṣṭamānā ||31 ||
SA07n934:64: sandṛśya bhartuśca vibhūṣaṇāni vāsāṃsi vīṇāprabhṛtīṃśca līlāḥ |
SA07n934:65: tamo viveśābhinanāda coccaiḥ paṅkāvatīrṇeva ca saṃsasāda ||32 ||
SA07n934:68: ruroda mamlau virurāva jaglau babhrāma tasthau vilalāpa dadhyau |
SA07n934:69: cakāra roṣaṃ vicakāra mālyaṃ cakarta vaktraṃ vicakarṣa vastram ||34 ||
SA07n934:70: tāṃ cārudantīṃ prasabhaṃ rudantīṃ saṃśrutya nāryaḥ paramābhitaptāḥ |
SA07n934:72: bāṣpeṇa tāḥ klinnaviṣaṇṇavaktrā varṣeṇa padminya ivārdrapadmāḥ |
SA07n934:76: yā tatra tāsāṃ vacasopapannā mānyā ca tasyā vayasādhikā ca |
SA07n934:77: sā pṛṣṭhatastāṃ tu samāliliṅge pramṛjya cāśrūṇi vacāṃsyuvāca ||38 ||
SA07n934:78: rājarṣivadhvāstava nānurūpo dharmāśrite bhartari jātu śokaḥ |
SA07n934:80: prāyeṇa mokṣāya viniḥsṛtānāṃ śākyarṣabhāṇāṃ viditāḥ striyaste |
SA07n934:82: yadyanyayā rūpaguṇādhikatvād bharttā hṛtaste kuru bāṣpamokṣam |
SA07n934:83: manasvinī rūpavatī guṇāḍhyā hṛdi kṣate kātra hi nāśru muñcet ||41 ||
SA07n934:84: athāpi kiṃcid vyasanaṃ prapanno mā caiva tad bhūt sadṛśo'tra bāṣpaḥ |
SA07n934:85: ato viśiṣṭaṃ na hi duḥkhamasti kulodgatāyāḥ patidevatāyāḥ ||42 ||
SA07n934:86: atha tvidānīṃ laḍitaḥ sukhena svasthaḥ phalastho vyasanānyadṛṣṭvā |
SA07n934:87: vītaspṛho dharmamanuprapannaḥ kiṃ viklavā rodiṣi harṣakāle ||43 ||
SA07n934:88: ityevamuktāpi bahuprakāraṃ snehāttayā naiva dhṛtiṃ cakāra |
SA07n934:90: bravīmi satyaṃ suviniścitaṃ me prāptaṃ priyaṃ drakṣyasi śīghrameva |
SA07n934:91: tvayā vinā sthāsyati tatra nāsau sattvāśrayaścetanayeva hīnaḥ ||45 ||
SA07n934:92: aṅke'pi lakṣmyā na sa nirvṛtaḥ syāt tvaṃ tasya pārśve yadi tatra na syāḥ |
SA07n934:93: āpatsu kṛcchrāsvapi cāgatāsu tvāṃ paśyatastasya bhavenna duḥkham ||46 ||
SA07n934:94: tvaṃ nirvṛtiṃ gaccha niyaccha bāṣpaṃ taptāśrumokṣāt parirakṣa cakṣuḥ |
SA07n934:95: yastasya bhāvastvayi yaśca rāgo na raṃsyate tvadvirahāt sa dharme ||47 ||
SA07n934:97: anātmanādāya gṛhonmukhasya punarvimoktuṃ ka ivāsti doṣaḥ ||48 ||
SA07n934:98: iti yuvatijanena sāntvyamānā hṛtahṛdayā ramaṇena sundarī sā |
SA07n934:100: saundarananda mahākāvye “bhāryā-vilāpa“ nāma ṣaṣṭha sarga samāpta |
